topicTitle: If you're banned on Puzzle or you're admin...

posts.postText:
This is concerning our bans on  Puzzle .

   If you're not banned, and you're not an admin, you can ignore this.   

To all the admins: The  only  reasons you should be banning  anyone  in Puzzle, is if they are griefing, hacking, or cheating.
If they're spamming, mute them. If they're spamming chat, gag them. If they rejoin to avoid it, simple permanently mute/gag them (!pmute and !pgag). 

The reason this is here, is because  if you are banned on Puzzle  your ban will  not  show on the Bans Page.
The only reason Puzzle shows on the Bans Page is so TTT bans are also on the server to keep cheaters, trolls, hackers and other various players out of the server.
